notes: Change the service's configuration by running: nssm edit 'Jellyfin Server'
Start the service by running: nssm start 'Jellyfin Server'
Stop the service by running: nssm stop 'Jellyfin Server'
Restart the service by running: nssm restart 'Jellyfin Server'
Querying the service's status by running: nssm status 'Jellyfin Server'
Remove the service by running: nssm remove 'Jellyfin Server' confirm
You should remove the service before uninstalling this package.
post_install: Start-Process PowerShell -Verb RunAs "-NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command `"nssm install 'Jellyfin Server' '$dir\system\jellyfin.exe' '-d $dir\data'; nssm set 'Jellyfin Server' Start SERVICE_DELAYED_AUTO_START; nssm set 'Jellyfin Server' AppPriority BELOW_NORMAL_PRIORITY_CLASS; nssm set 'Jellyfin Server' AppAffinity $affinity`""
Write-Host 'Jellyfin Server has been set as a service, it will automatically start when the system starts.' -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host 'The process affinity has been set the latter half of your CPU cores.' -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host 'The process priority has been set to lower than normal.' -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host 'This service will be run under ''LocalSystem'' account. You may want to change it to your own.' -ForegroundColor Yellow

Start-Process PowerShell -Verb RunAs "-NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command `"New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName 'Jellyfin Server' -Direction Inbound -Program '$scoopdir\apps\jellyfin-nssm\$version\system\jellyfin.exe' -Protocol TCP -Action Allow; New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName 'Jellyfin Server' -Direction Inbound -Program '$scoopdir\apps\jellyfin-nssm\$version\system\jellyfin.exe' -Protocol UDP -Action Allow -LocalPort 1900,7359`""
